project_descr: Strengthening capacities in BiH to address environmental problems through remediation of high priority hot spots

outputs.output_descr: the aim of this project is to achieve improvement of environmental situation and the quality of life for citizens living in and around polluted areas, through least cost measures, improved local and national policy dialogue and supply of domestic professional services in the environmental management sector. While the main focus is on the physical works needed to mitigate the ecological problems in the Tuzla municipality, as one of the most polluted in BiH, institutional strengthening and capacity building are also an important subject running throughout the project.
